Best Salons at Pacific Epping, Melbourne’s North

Looking for a salon in Melbourne’s northern suburbs? Frantically typing “beautician near me” into your phone? Rest easy, as we have the perfect solution for you! Pacific Epping Shopping Centre is home to an incredible selection of beauty and spa retailers, with a number of high-quality, luxe salons offering a wide variety of services to suit all your skin and haircare needs. From eyebrow threading to laser hair removal, whether you're after a new hairstyle, beauty treatments or spa packages, you're sure to find what you're looking for at Pacific Epping. 
 
If you are keen for a new salon to try, here are a few of the best salons at Pacific Epping in Melbourne’s north.
 

Massages and spa packages at Body & Balance Massage

Body & Balance offers a wide range of massage and bodywork services, including deep tissue massage, hot stone massage, reflexology and aromatherapy. Body & Balance also offers a variety of other wellness services, such as facials, waxing and nail care. The perfect place to relax and rejuvenate, you're sure to leave feeling your best!

Laser hair removal at Brazilian Butterfly

Brazilian Butterfly offers a wide range of beauty services, including waxing, tanning, IPL hair removal, and skin treatments. The team at Brazilian Butterfly is highly experienced and qualified and they are committed to providing their clients with the best possible service.
 

Treatment packages at Australian Skin Clinics

Australian Skin Clinics is a medical-grade skincare clinic that offers a variety of treatments, including laser hair removal, skin tightening, and acne treatment. The staff are highly qualified and experienced, and they use only the latest technology. Australian Skin Clinics is the perfect place to get the skin you've always wanted.

Hair essentials at Essential Beauty

Essential Beauty is a hair salon that offers a variety of services, including haircuts, colour and styling. Using only the highest quality products, Essential Beauty is the perfect place to get a new look that will make you feel confident and beautiful.
 

Eyebrow threading at Brows Threading

Brows Threading offers a variety of eyebrow threading services, including shaping, tinting and waxing. They also offer a variety of other beauty services, such as facials, massages, and nail care. Brows Threading is a great option for anyone looking for a professional and affordable eyebrow threading service.
 

Manicures at Beyond Nails

Beyond Nails is nail salon located in Melbourne’s north that offers a variety of services, including manicures, pedicures, gel nails and nail art. The staff are experienced and use only the highest quality products. Whether you're looking for a quick and simple manicure or a more elaborate nail art design, Beyond Nails is the perfect place to get your nails looking their best.
 

Acupuncture at HEQI Therapy

HEQI Therapy is a Chinese medicine clinic that offers a variety of treatments, including acupuncture, massage, reflexology and cupping. Their devoted and qualified team provides clients with a relaxing and rejuvenating experience. Using only traditional Chinese medicine techniques, HEQI Therapy is the perfect place to relax and rejuvenate, leaving you feeling your best.
 

Pedicures at Organica Nails

Organica Nails is a salon that offers manicures, pedicures and gel nails as well as a variety of other services. The salon uses only organic and vegan products so that you can have your nails looking their very best — without harming the environment. 
 

Beauty treatments at Spa Beautique

Spa Beautique is a full-service spa offering a wide range of treatments and services, including facials, massages, body treatments and nail care. Spa Beautique is a great place to relax, rejuvenate and help you feel your best. If you are looking for a day of pampering, Spa Beautique is the perfect place for you!

 

 

Everything eyebrows at The Beauty & Brow Parlour

The Beauty & Brow Parlour offers a variety of beauty treatments, including haircuts, colour, styling and brow shaping. They have a team of experienced and qualified beauticians who can help you achieve your desired look and offer a wide range of pricing options to fit every budget. The Beauty & Brow Parlour is the perfect place to get a new look that will make you feel confident and beautiful.
 
Ready to visit the best salons in Melbourne’s north? 
 
These are just a small range of the best Melbourne north salons — all located onsite at Pacific Epping. With so many options to choose from, you're sure to find the perfect salon for your needs!

We acknowledge and respect the traditional lands and cultures of the Wurundjeri people of the Kulin Nation, the Traditional Owners and Custodians of the Country on which Pacific Epping resides, and pay our respects to Elders past and present. We recognise First Nations peoples’ longstanding and ongoing spiritual connections to land, sea, community, and country.
